actions.name: Anger Shell

cost.trigger: The user falls to 50% HP or lower as a result of an attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user falls to 50% HP or lower as a result of an attack.
Effect: The user gains +1 ATK, SPATK, and SPD stages and loses -1 DEF and SPDEF stages for 5 activations.

system.description:
